373560.name: D4: Special Costume Set -12 Beers-
373560.description:
This pack features additional character costumes – a T-shirt for Young that provides very high parameter boosts, and costumes for the 3 main characters.

David Young
D4 Lager T-Shirt / Greyish Brown
Stamina +50, Vision +5, Life +5
D4 Ale T-Shirt / Red
Stamina +50, Vision +5, Life +5
D4 Stout T-Shirt / Black
Stamina +50, Vision +5, Life +5

Forrest Kaysen
Lieutenant Style Set
Avant Garde! Set
Cool Biz Set

Amanda
Police Academy Set
Avant Garde! Set
Monkey Dance Set

Olivia Jones
Agent Style Set
Avant Garde! Set
AG Pilot Set

※ Once downloaded, this content will be added to the base game.
※ This content is included in the Deluxe Edition.
373560.supported_languages:
英语*, 法语, 意大利语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 日语, 葡萄牙语 - 葡萄牙
*具有完全音频支持的语言
